author: smilek
msg: replaced drag&drop solution with code borrowed from dojo-0.9, also adding scrolling support during drag and much improved position detection for ghost window placement; changed _splitAndFixPaths_scriptsonly to modify portlet content containing dojo.addOnLoad/addOnUnload to call into equivalent methods in ContentPane base class; improved destroy/closeWindow support to handle cleaning up dojo widgets created by portlets
